Header.title: Collaborative Decision Making
Header.paragraph: A collaborative decision making platform for organizations to save time, remove bias, and make informed group decisions.

About.paragraph: DecisionHub is a digital end-to-end decision making platform that allows organizations to easily make unbiased group decisions involving multiple stakeholders.
About.paragraph2: Our web platform handles the interactions between all stakeholders including the admins, applicants and reviewers.

OurGoal.paragraph: We believe every applicant should have the oppourtunity to be reviewed in a fair way. We believe every admin should have the tools to make the best informed decisions free of bias. We are committed to ensuring both of these.

Features.title: Forms Creation
Features.text: Organization admins can create and publish an online form for applicants to apply to with various different question types, brand customization and custom links to send to applicants.

Features.title: Forms Submission
Features.text: Applicants apply via a link (without logging in if they choose). Applicants enjoy a wide range of features like saving and editing submissions, autofilling answers (if they are a repeat applicant) and the ability to view and download PDFs of all past submitted applications.

Features.title: Review Tool
Features.text: Review members can log into the platform and perform independent, unbiased, reviews on all applications within the round. They will only see applications assigned to them

Features.title: Admin Tools
Features.text: Admins are provided with a wide range of tools including User Management, Multiple Statistics Pages, Assigning Reviewers, Form Management and Export Options. All data (including comments) can be exported in csv format and with one button you can download all applications in separate PDFs stored in one folder
